summary: "Earnings themselves are simply an abstraction for these thesis stocks and any disappointment is simply one more reason to buy them," CNBC's Jim Cramer said of stocks including Zoom, Roku, Peloton and Netflix.
headline: Jim Cramer says these 7 'thesis' stocks, including Peloton and Netflix, will go higher until coronavirus is controlled
Cramer: Investors should consider taking profits in 'red hot' tech stocks such as Zoom and Cloudflare
summary: CNBC's Jim Cramer said investors should consider taking profits in major pandemic winners such as Zoom Video Communications and Cloudflare.
Bianco Research's James Bianco warns the economic backdrop could push the Federal Reserve to tighten and upset the stock market.
headline: Inflation comeback may force Fed to abandon easy money policy much sooner than intended, Wall Street forecaster Jim Bianco warns

summary: Revenue declines have returned under new IBM CEO Arvind Krishna as he seeks to sell off part of the company's largest business segment.
headline: IBM reports third straight quarter of revenue declines

summary: IBM is set to report earnings after the bell. Ari Wald of Oppenheimer and Delano Saporu of New Street Advisors lay out where the stock heads next.
headline: What IBM’s next move could be after earnings, according to traders

summary: Harvard University is joining other colleges and higher-education groups in opposing another federal proposal aimed at foreign students, this one limiting the length of stay at U.S. schools to four years or less.
headline: Harvard Opposes U.S. Plan to Limit Stay of Foreign Students

summary: Rha Goddess and Deepa Purushothaman created nFormation, a first--of-its-kind membership based app for women of color that's launching in January 2021.
headline: Meet the entrepreneurs creating a membership-based platform to help women of color succeed at work

summary: "The Fed has an important role to play. We must be central to this conversation. And increasingly, I think we are," Bostic said
headline: Bostic says the Fed needs to do more to address racial economic impact from the pandemic

summary: Turner Sports announced The Match 3 golf event would including Charles Barkley, Stephen Curry and Peyton Manning.
headline: 'The Match 3' golf tournament set for Nov. 27 to benefit Black colleges

summary: Since the pandemic hit, companies around the world have accelerated their digital transformations, adopting cloud-based remote collaboration tools and seeking data-driven insights.

headline: Cramer: We’re in a ‘wacko market’ when stay-at-home stocks with few sales actually make sense
summary: The "Mad Money" host cited cloud company Snowflake and Zoom as "dominate American companies" capitalizing online during the coronavirus pandemic.
Earnings season is picking up speed this week with 80 S&P 500 and eight Dow 30 components reporting results. Traders share which to watch.
headline: A chipmaker and railroad stock: Traders share the top earnings reports to watch
These charts show how CARES Act savings are running out for unemployed Americans
summary: A report from the JPMorgan Chase Institute shows that unemployed Chase customers saw a drop in spending and shrinking account balances in August.

headline: NASA is launching a 4G mobile network on the moon
summary: NASA has selected Nokia to build the first-ever 4G mobile network on the moon, the Finnish telecom firm announced Monday.

headline: AMC CEO says reopening New York theaters is 'a monumental step forward' for battered industry
summary: Movie theaters, which have been thrashed by the coronavirus pandemic, have received a glimmer of hope after New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo announced Saturday that theaters around the state could reopen as soon as Oct. 23.
"It looks like we're entering a pretty difficult period right now," Dr. Scott Gottlieb told CNBC on Monday. "There's really no backstop here."
headline: Dr. Scott Gottlieb: U.S. is in the 7th inning of the pandemic but the 'hardest part' is likely ahead

summary: Several months into the global coronavirus pandemic, the average FICO credit score in the U.S. hit another record high of 711 in July, according to the latest research.
headline: The average FICO credit score hit new record highs during the pandemic—here’s why
Watch Fed Chair Jerome Powell speak live to the International Monetary Fund
summary: Powell's remarks are part of a session on "Cross-Border Payments and Digital Currencies."

headline: Apple's first-day pre-orders for iPhone 12 surpassed the iPhone 11, top analyst says
summary: The iPhone 12 Pro sold better than expected, especially in China, according to Ming-Chi Kuo of TF International securities.

headline: Active funds are not being muscled out by ETFs, Refinitiv expert says
summary: Although exchange-traded funds are growing in popularity, they are not yet making meaningful incursions into the territory of actively-managed funds, according to Refinitive's Head of Lipper EMEA Research, Detlef Glow.
